about_the_game:
Play as Kiichigo, the worst barista ever hired, and help her be somewhat decent at her job! Meet a vibrant cast of characters, mix drinks, foster relationships with your patrons, and help them bond with one another. Discover the castle's secrets and uncover the truth about yourself in this story-rich, gothic fairy tale where your decisions will shape the world and its characters.

A tale of loss, betrayal, kinship, and hope. Forgotten or left behind are your most precious memories of who you are, but what still lies deep within you is a growing power. But what will you use this power for? In a land divided, broken and filled with corruption, your connections with others are everything, but the power within you beckons for something else. Tangled in a conflict between a powerful dragon prince, deities, spirits, and other wicked forces beyond the imagination, your choices will decide the fate of the world and the inhabitants.

The game features:

Brewing Drinks of All Kinds!


  • Mix a wide range of ingredients to create out of this world drinks to serve to your lovely customers! Your brewing station includes magical ingredients such as draconic charcoal (coffee), tea leaves, honey, syrup, powder, milk, fruit and more!
  • Brew your mystical concoction in many unique ways! Using the magic of your brewing station, you can blend, mix, age, and mess with the temperature of each beverage to create the perfect drink for your customer!

Develop Meaningful Relationships with Customers!


  • Meet a diverse cast of characters from different types of backgrounds and races. Develop your relationship with them to learn more about each character you meet and forge long lasting bonds, either platonic or romantic!

Help Customers Develop Relationships with Each Other!


  • Every patron has a life outside of the cafe, with their own personal troubles, desires, and aspirations. Help them make friends with others by pairing them up with other characters for activities and outings. Overtime, their relationship with one another will grow and affect the story.

Explore a Gothic Fantasy Fairytale World


  • Traverse through the castle, talk to your co-workers in their office space and rooms, and discover the secrets that lie dormant in Harold’s castle. An entire world is just beyond your finger tips, with their own diverse races, histories and secrets. Will you be brave enough to push on and look for your answers beyond the castle?

Make Choices That Will Change You And The World


  • What drinks you serve, who you side with, and what you say will have a lasting affect on the world and characters. Each decision will pave the path forward to finding the truth about yourself. Foster relationships with friends, create enemies, and decide who you will become.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages. Crude Humor and Coarse Language is present in the game. Some parts of the game contain Alcoholic Drinks, Partial Nudity, Sexual Content, and General Mature Content.

name: Cali&Co Cafe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Display Memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo

short_description: Cali&Co Cafe is a story-rich, drink-mixing dating sim set in a gothic fairytale world featuring cartoonish humour and a vibrant cast of characters. Foster relationships with your patrons, help them bond with one another, and influence the story and world with your decisions, one drink at a time.
